headline: Cooper Companies (COO): Assessing Valuation as Shares Lag Behind Analyst Targets
summary: Cooper Companies (COO) stock has experienced some ups and downs lately, with shares dipping slightly by 1% on the most recent trading day. Over the past month, however, the stock has managed to edge up by about 1%. See our latest analysis for Cooper Companies. After a volatile stretch, Cooper Companies' share price currently sits at $71.75, well below where it started the year. This reflects a year-to-date share price return of -20.86%.
